DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass MK0767 , compare Metformin , perform lower blood glucose level patient whose Type II diabetes control diet exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Study MK0767 Metformin Type 2 Diabetic Patients ( 0767-020 )
DOC.criteria: Patients men nonpregnant woman age 21 78 year Patients either antihyperglycemic medication ( > 8 week ) , treat single oral antihyperglycemic agent & willing discontinue therapy duration study Patient history type 1 diabetes mellitus history ketoacidosis Patients undergoing surgery within 30 day Visit 1 Patients take Warfin Warfinlike anticoagulants Patients weight loss program ongoing weight loss start intensive exercise program within 4 week Visit 1/Week 9
